title: Sonam Kapoor
summary: Sonam Kapoor Ahuja (pronounced [soːnəm kəˈpuːr ]; née Kapoor;[3] born 9 June 1985) is an Indian actress who works in Hindi cinema (Bollywood). She has won a National Film Award and a Filmfare Award, and from 2012 to 2016, she appeared in Forbes India's Celebrity 100 list based on her income and popularity.
